item.name: Wayne Thomas Wines
item.description: Wayne Thomas was a McLaren Vale veteran, having started his winemaking career in 1961, working for Stonyfell, Ryecroft and Saltram before establishing Fern Hill with his late wife Pat in â€™75. When they sold Fern Hill in 1994 they started again, launching the Wayne Thomas Wines label, using grapes sourced from growers throughout McLaren Vale. Wayne Thomas passed away in April 2007. Exports to the UK, the US, Canada and Hong Kong.
